output.sentences: Of all the confections in the store, the one that caught my eye was the Scotch egg.
I was relieved to discover that it was made of chocolate and not sausage wrapped around a hard boiled egg.
Three were other sweets in this sweet shop but I could not figure out exactly what they were
At the next counter was chocolate in a creamy substance--what?
At last, straight up chocolate--I recognized it--and I would be safe with that.
